= Login Example =

Please read the [LoginExampleFeatureSpec Feature Specification] of the Login Example application. Implementations with different Flex SDKs (Flex 3.5 and Flex 4), Microarchitecture MVC Frameworks (for now only Cairngorm 2.2.1), IoC Frameworks (Parsley 2.4.0, Spring 1.1, Swiz 1.0), [Nanoarchitecture Nanoarchitectures] ([NanoarchitectureMVCb MVCb], Ctl, Cmd, [NanoarchitectureNoEvt NoEvt], PInj ... etc.), Cairngorm 3 Libraries (Validation Library, Task Library) and Testing frameworks (for now only !FlexUnit 4.0) are listed below. The code follows additional Flex coding conventions ([Flex3CodingConventions Flex 3], Flex 4 TODO). 

http://masuland.googlecode.com/files/LoginExamplePrintScreen.png
